Posts.Content: HolyRolly wrote: My friend who was a breast cancer survivor turned me on to a mattress pad that cools (or heats) the bed: http://www.chilitechnology.com/ I wish they had one of these in every hospital. It was a lifesaver for me because the chemo would make me alternately very hot, and then freezing cold - and I could adjust my bed using a remote control. Log in to post a reply
